title: History of amendments
description: As presented in the Governance on-chain chapter, the Tezos blockchain is constantly evolving through new amendments. In this chapter, we will go over past proposals' history. We will see the reasons for their approval or disapproval.

frontMatter.title: History of amendments
frontMatter.authors: Thomas Zoughebi, Aymeric Bethencourt, and Maxime Fernandez
